abilities.name: Damage Resistances
abilities.description: Acid, bludeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

abilities.name: Condition Immunities
abilities.description: Exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconcious

abilities.name: Water Form
abilities.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

abilities.name: Freeze
abilities.description: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target
Hit: 2d8 + 4 bludeoning damage

actions.name: Whelm (Recharge 4-6)
actions.description:
Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 2d8 + 4 bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grapped (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe, unless it can breath underwater. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.
The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two smaller Medium or smaller creatures at a time with this ability. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each grappled target takes 2d8 + 4 bludgeoning damage. As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or an object out of it by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength check.
